Articles.Content:
Ok, I have a pretty clear idea on the operators involved (crewmember.experiencelevel += 1, etc), but I'm not clear on how to access a specific Kerbal to do this.

The idea is to create a "Training Center," where the player can spend funds to raise a Kerbal's experience level. You'd have a menu with a list of the Available kerbals (I can do that part already), but I don't know where to start on getting a button working for each one to raise their level. Does anyone have a good place to start working on this portion of it? Not looking for code, more just pointers on what method is used to access a specific Kerbal's stats.
